verses.verse: "Woe<WH1945> to the rebellious<WH5637> children,<WH1121>" says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> "who take<WH6213> counsel,<WH6098> but not from me;<WH5258> and who make an alliance,<WH4541> but not with my Spirit,<WH7307> that they may add<WH5595> sin<WH2403> to sin,<WH2403>

who set<WH1980> out to go down<WH3381> into Egypt,<WH4714> and have not asked<WH7592> my advice;<WH6310> to strengthen<WH5810> themselves in the strength<WH4581> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> and to take refuge<WH2620> in the shadow<WH6738> of Egypt!<WH4714>
Therefore the strength<WH4581> of Pharaoh<WH6547> will be your shame,<WH1322> and the refuge<WH2622> in the shadow<WH6738> of Egypt<WH4714> your confusion.<WH3639>
For their princes<WH8269> are at Zoan,<WH6814> and their ambassadors<WH4397> have come<WH5060> to Hanes.<WH2609>
They shall all be ashamed<WH3001> because of a people<WH5971> that can't<WH3276> profit them,<WH5828> that are not a help nor profit,<WH3276> but a shame,<WH1322> and also a reproach.<WH2781>"

The burden<WH4853> of the animals<WH929> of the South.<WH5045> Through the land<WH776> of trouble<WH6869> and anguish,<WH6695> of the lioness<WH3918> and the lion,<WH3918> the viper<WH660> and fiery<WH8314> flying<WH5774> serpent,<WH8314> they carry<WH5375> their riches<WH2428> on the shoulders<WH3802> of young donkeys,<WH5895> and their treasures<WH214> on the humps<WH1707> of camels,<WH1581> to an unprofitable<WH3276> people.<WH5971>
For Egypt<WH4714> helps<WH5826> in vain,<WH1892> and to no purpose;<WH7385> therefore have I called<WH7121> her<WH1992> Rahab<WH7293> who<WH2063> sits still.<WH7674>

Now go,<WH935> write<WH3789> it before them on a tablet,<WH3871> and inscribe<WH2710> it in a book,<WH5612> that it may be for<WH5704> the time<WH3117> to come<WH314> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5703>
For it is a rebellious<WH4805> people,<WH5971> lying<WH3586> children,<WH1121> children<WH1121> who will<WH14> not hear<WH8085> the law<WH8451> of Yahweh;<WH3068>

who tell<WH559> the seers,<WH7200> "Don't<WH7200> see!" and to the prophets,<WH2374> "Don't<WH2372> prophesy to us right things.<WH5229> Tell<WH1696> us pleasant things.<WH2513> Prophesy<WH2372> deceits.<WH4123>
Get out<WH5493> of the way.<WH1870> Turn aside<WH5186> from the path.<WH734> Cause the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> to cease<WH7673> from before us.<WH6440>"

Therefore thus says<WH559> the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel,<WH3478> "Because you despise<WH3988> this word,<WH1697> and trust<WH982> in oppression<WH6233> and perverseness,<WH3868> and rely on it;<WH8172>

therefore this iniquity<WH5771> shall be to you like a breach<WH6556> ready to fall,<WH5307> swelling out<WH1158> in a high<WH7682> wall,<WH2346> whose breaking<WH7667> comes<WH935> suddenly<WH6597> in an instant.<WH6621>

He will break<WH7665> it as a potter<WH3335>'s vessel<WH5035> is broken,<WH7667> breaking it in pieces<WH3807> without sparing,<WH2550> so that there won't<WH4672> be found among the broken piece<WH4386> a piece<WH2789> good enough to take<WH2846> fire<WH784> from the hearth,<WH3344> or to dip<WH2834> up water<WH4325> out of the cistern.<WH1360>"

For thus said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel,<WH3478> "You will be saved<WH3467> in returning<WH7729> and rest.<WH5183> Your strength<WH1369> will be in quietness<WH8252> and in confidence.<WH985>" You refused,<WH14>

but you said,<WH559> "No,<WH5127> for we will flee on horses;<WH5483>" therefore you will flee;<WH5127> and,<WH7392> "We will ride on the swift;<WH7031>" therefore those who pursue<WH7291> you will be swift.<WH7043>

One<WH259> thousand<WH505> will flee at<WH6440> the threat<WH1606> of one.<WH259> At<WH6440> the threat<WH1606> of five,<WH2568> you will flee<WH5127> until you are left<WH3498> like a beacon<WH8650> on the top<WH7218> of a mountain,<WH2022> and like a banner<WH5251> on a hill.<WH1389>

Therefore Yahweh<WH3068> will wait,<WH2442> that he may be gracious<WH2603> to you;<WH7311> and therefore he will be exalted, that he may have mercy<WH7355> on you,<WH3068> for Yahweh is a God<WH430> of justice.<WH4941> Blessed<WH835> are all those who wait for him.<WH2442>

For the people<WH5971> will dwell<WH3427> in Zion<WH6726> at Jerusalem.<WH3389> You will weep<WH1058> no more.<WH1058> He will surely<WH2603> be gracious<WH2603> to you at the voice<WH6963> of your cry.<WH2199> When he hears<WH8085> you,<WH6030> he will answer you.

Though the Lord<WH136> may give<WH5414> you the bread<WH3899> of adversity<WH6862> and the water<WH4325> of affliction,<WH3906> yet your teachers<WH3384> won't<WH3670> be hidden anymore,<WH5869> but your eyes will see<WH7200> your teachers;<WH3384>

and when you turn to the right hand,<WH541> and when you turn to the left,<WH8041> your ears<WH241> will hear<WH8085> a voice<WH1697> behind<WH310> you,<WH559> saying, "This is the way.<WH1870> Walk in it.<WH3212>"

You shall defile<WH2930> the overlaying<WH6826> of your engraved images<WH6456> of silver,<WH3701> and the plating<WH642> of your molten images<WH4541> of gold.<WH2091> You shall cast them away<WH2219> as an unclean thing.<WH1739> You shall tell<WH559> it,<WH3318> "Go away!"

He will give<WH5414> the rain<WH4306> for your seed,<WH2233> with which you will sow<WH2232> the ground;<WH127> and bread<WH3899> of the increase<WH8393> of the ground<WH127> will be rich<WH1879> and plentiful.<WH8082> In that day,<WH3117> your livestock<WH4735> will feed<WH7462> in large<WH7337> pastures.<WH3733>

The oxen<WH504> likewise and the young donkeys<WH5895> that till<WH5647> the ground<WH127> will eat<WH398> savory<WH2548> provender,<WH1098> which has been winnowed<WH2219> with the shovel<WH7371> and with the fork.<WH4214>

There shall be brooks<WH6388> and streams<WH2988> of water<WH4325> on every lofty<WH1364> mountain<WH2022> and on every high<WH5375> hill<WH1389> in the day<WH3117> of the great<WH7227> slaughter,<WH2027> when the towers<WH4026> fall.<WH5307>

Moreover the light<WH216> of the moon<WH3842> will be like the light<WH216> of the sun,<WH2535> and the light<WH216> of the sun<WH2535> will be seven<WH7651> times brighter,<WH216> like the light of seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> in the day<WH3117> that Yahweh<WH3068> binds up<WH2280> the fracture<WH7667> of his people,<WH5971> and heals<WH7495> the wound<WH4347> they were struck with.<WH4273>

Behold,<WH8034> the name of Yahweh<WH3068> comes<WH935> from far<WH4801> away,<WH1197> burning with his anger,<WH639> and in thick<WH4858> rising smoke.<WH3514> His lips<WH8193> are full<WH4390> of indignation,<WH2195> and his tongue<WH3956> is as a devouring<WH398> fire.<WH784>

His breath<WH7307> is as an overflowing<WH7857> stream<WH5158> that reaches even to<WH2673> the neck,<WH6677> to sift<WH5130> the nations<WH1471> with the sieve<WH5299> of destruction;<WH7723> and a bridle<WH7448> that leads to ruin<WH8582> will be in the jaws<WH3895> of the peoples.<WH5971>

You will have a song,<WH7892> as in the night<WH3915> when a holy<WH6942> feast<WH2282> is kept;<WH6942> and gladness<WH8057> of heart,<WH3824> as when one goes<WH1980> with a flute<WH2485> to come<WH935> to Yahweh<WH3068>'s mountain,<WH2022> to Israel<WH3478>'s Rock.<WH6697>

Yahweh<WH3068> will cause his glorious<WH1935> voice<WH6963> to be heard,<WH8085> and will show<WH7200> the descent<WH5183> of his arm,<WH2220> with the indignation<WH2197> of his anger,<WH639> and the flame<WH3851> of a devouring<WH398> fire,<WH784> with a blast,<WH5311> storm,<WH2230> and hailstones.<WH68>
For through the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> the Assyrian<WH804> will be dismayed.<WH2865> He will strike<WH5221> him with his rod.<WH7626>

Every stroke<WH3605> of the rod<WH4294> of punishment,<WH4145> which Yahweh<WH3068> will<WH4569> lay<WH5117> on him,<WH8596> will be with the sound of tambourines and harps.<WH3658> He will fight<WH3898> with them in battles,<WH4421> brandishing weapons.<WH8573>

For his burning<WH8613> place has long<WH865> been ready.<WH6186> Yes,<WH4428> for the king it is prepared.<WH3559> He has made its pyre<WH4071> deep<WH6009> and large<WH7337> with fire<WH784> and much<WH7235> wood.<WH6086> Yahweh<WH3068>'s breath,<WH5397> like a stream<WH5158> of sulfur,<WH1614> kindles it.<WH1197>
